page.title: 12PRIMARY SCHOOL-TEANASSIE
page.content: The school isn't a very big one.It has 34 pupils and 2 teachers.5 pupils are leaving this year to go to Charleston Academy in Inverness.8 new pupils are coming to school next session.We have visiting art and music teachers, and a minister who comes once a week.We have a tuckshop which sells crisps and lemonade.We had an experiment using health foods,which worked quite well. We have a big shinty pitch and a playground.There's a big hill in part of the playground which is great for sledging on in winter.In the winter time we come sliding down on old fertilizer bags and things like that.We have good snowball fights.The wee ones love making snowmen.Sometimes in winter time we don't get to school because the roads are too bad and snowploughs have to clear them.
